Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with wild-type or mutant LRRK2 plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: The G2019S variant increased LRRK2 kinase activity by 150% compared to wild-type.
The R1441C variant increased LRRK2 kinase activity by 120% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across three independent cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in duplicate using the kinase assay kit.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 20% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 150% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with wild-type or mutant LRRK2 plasmids and monitored for viability.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell viability for G2019S variant was 95% compared to wild-type.
Cell viability for R1441C variant was 93% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across three independent cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in duplicate using the MTT assay.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for comparison between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability below 70% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cell lysates were analyzed for LRRK2 protein expression.

Readout description.Result Description: The G2019S variant showed a 30% increase in LRRK2 protein levels.
The R1441C variant showed a 25% increase in LRRK2 protein levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in triplicate across three independent cell cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in duplicate using Western blot with anti-LRRK2 antibody.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression exceeding 30% of wild-type levels.
